flocksimulator.domain

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • flocksimulator.domain.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Flocker, MockAgent

    public abstract class Agent
extends Object
    Class implementing "boids" model from paper by Craig W. Reynolds http://www.red3d.com/cwr/steer/gdc99/ Independent agents with specified behaviors can be put in a system to model even more complex behaviors.
    Author:
    peje

    • Method Detail

      • seek

        protected Vector seek(Vector target)
        Method to calculate and apply a correcting steering force towards a target point: correction = desired minus velocity
        Parameters:
        target - to which to calculate force
        Returns:
        force vector to be applied to agents velocity

      • flee

        Method to calculate and apply a correcting steering force away from a target point correction = desired force minus velocity

        target - to which to calculate force
        Returns:
        force vector to be applied to agents velocity

      • applyBehaviors

        public abstract void applyBehaviors(FlockList<Agent> agents,
                                    Vector target)
        Combine behaviors to create more complex behavior
        Parameters:
        agents - list of other agents which are neighbors to this agent
        target - a point to maybe use for seeking or fleeing

      • updateRotation

        public void updateRotation()
        Rotate polygon. Is very CPU intensive with many agents on screen.
